001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.CentralChallengeResponse;
008
009import java.util.Arrays;
010
011/**
012 * The first message sent on connection to a Tandem pump which begins the authorization process.
013 *
014 * When the Android libary is used, this message is invoked automatically by PumpX2 on Bluetooth
015 * connection initialization as part of performing the initial pump pairing process.
016 */
017/**
018 * The first message sent on connection to a Tandem pump which begins the authorization process.
019 *
020 * When the Android libary is used, this message is invoked automatically by PumpX2 on Bluetooth
021 * connection initialization as part of performing the initial pump pairing process.
022 *
023
024 *
025 * <br>
026 *
027 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.AbstractCentralChallengeResponse}, opCode 16, size 10
028 *
029 * <br>
030 *
031 * 
032 * <table border='1'>
033 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>16</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>10</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#AUTHORIZATION}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication.AbstractCentralChallengeResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * </table>
040 */@MessageProps(
041    opCode=16,
042    size=10,
043    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
044    characteristic=Characteristic.AUTHORIZATION,
045    response=CentralChallengeResponse.class
046)
047public class CentralChallengeRequest extends AbstractCentralChallengeRequest {
048    private int appInstanceId;
049    private byte[] centralChallenge;
050
051    public CentralChallengeRequest() {}
052
053    public CentralChallengeRequest(int appInstanceId, byte[] centralChallenge) {
054        this.cargo = buildCargo(appInstanceId, centralChallenge);
055        this.appInstanceId = appInstanceId;
056        this.centralChallenge = centralChallenge; // len=10
057    }
058
059    public int getAppInstanceId() {
060        return appInstanceId;
061    }
062
063    public byte[] getCentralChallenge() {
064        return centralChallenge;
065    }
066
067    private static byte[] buildCargo(int appInstanceId, byte[] centralChallenge) {
068        byte[] cargo = new byte[10];
069        System.arraycopy(Bytes.combine(Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(appInstanceId), centralChallenge), 0, cargo, 0, 10);
070
071        return cargo;
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * <table border="1">
076     * <caption>Parsed fields for CentralChallengeRequest:</caption>
077     * <tr><td><code>appInstanceId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 0, 2), 0)</code></td></tr>
078     * <tr><td><code>centralChallenge</code></td><td><code>Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 2, raw.length)</code></td></tr>
079     * </table>
080     */
081    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
082        this.cargo = raw;
083        this.appInstanceId = Bytes.readShort(Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 0, 2), 0);
084        this.centralChallenge = Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 2, raw.length);
085    }
086}
